name: Joker and Sayori Commit Arson Raiding The Geneva Convention
name_original: Joker and Sayori Commit Arson Raiding The Geneva Convention
description:
The third game in the hit series 'Joker And Sayori Commit Arson' has finally been released! I hope you enjoy this totally serious RPG that is super epic. there are new features like being in a slightly higher resolution! play the game to see the new additions and a new story!

Credits to things that aren't mine:

Joker sprites by angel-of-britannia

Sayori sprites by Goldfang

All music can be found by searching their title on youtube.
